wikipedia_page.main: Sir Charles Petrie, 1st Baronet DL (1853 – 8 July 1920) was a Scottish businessman and local politician, Lord Mayor of Liverpool in 1901–2.

response: Born in Liverpool, he was the younger son of Sir Charles Petrie, 1st Baronet and his wife, Hannah. He was educated at the University of Oxford, and in 1927 succeeded to the family baronetcy.
* Sir Charles Petrie, 1st Baronet (1853–1920), Scottish businessman and Lord Mayor of Liverpool
